game.name: Call of Cause
game.description:
Are you waiting for the realistic and engaging action-packed challenge? Join Call of Cause and get ready to complete multiple missions infected by a horde of blood sucking zombies! Your objective is to find your destiny and achieve your targets with the help of limited ammo. Make sure to kill your enemies with the heads to clear your mission with the maximum points. Be careful on your way and keep moving until you spot the maps and key in this brand new action game!

In the first mission, you have to find the girl and take her to a safe place! Many obstacles will be there on your way to protect you from moving forward. Put your intense fighting abilities to clear the mission with the maximum possible stars! Once you complete the first mission, you would receive the message for your second mission. Kill zombies immediately before they do the same with you in this 3D shooting simulator game! You can press the CapsLock button to look control panel. 

It will be highly exciting to witness a match between the creeper and you. Complete all the missions by putting your sharp shooter abilities and show the world that you are skilled enough to fight alone with the geeks! Common boys, you are a brave soldier lashed with the needful weapons! Grab your weapon and upgrade them time to time and try to save the lives of hostages to prove yourself! All the best to destroy all the zombies, undead, and rescue the survivals! Unlock and earn lots of new characters and weapons and have a blast in this html5 shooter! Enjoy many more tricky and challenging action-packed challenges online for free without download!

game.metaDesc: Play the online free game Call of Cause at atmegame.com ! We have selected this Shooting games for best excitement and thrill in you!
